subtitle: Choose mussels that  are clean and not damaged. You can buy them pre-packed from supermarkets or from the local fishmonger.

method.text: Rinse the mussels and drain well. Heat the butter in a very large pan and saute the onion for 2-3 min or until just soft.

Stir in the cheese and wine and bring to the boil. Add the mussels. Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 4-6 min or until the shells open. Toss the mussels in the sauce discarding any which are unopened.
Spoon the mussels into large soup bowls and sprinkle with the parsley. Serve immediately.

title: Boursin mussels
